column1: The Purple Pig////We finished with the Sicilian iris [$11]; we had hoped to order the bombalone as well
column2: but the kitchen ran out. The iris was a satisfying end to our meal
column3: a crispy brioche filled with a mixture of ricotta and slightly melted chocolate chips akin to that of cannoli. Not transcendent
column4: but certainly delicious and very dangerous. If they started selling these more commonly in stores
column5: my waistline would certainly be in trouble.
